snippet.title: KSP2: Space Planes are hard, yo!
snippet.description:
Broadcasted live on Twitch -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/quill18

After the stream, I restarted KSP2 and instantly and easily achieved orbit with my space plane. I think the reason it went so well the first time and then got harder over the stream is because something is broken and doesn't get cleaned up right between launches.

Not only was the weird "jerk to the left" gone and the plane just generally more controllable, the acceleration was better -- like there had been a big reduction in drag. Maybe some of the control surfaces were locking into a glitched state?

snippet.title: Kerbal Space Program 2: New Game, New Computer! - 1st Stream

snippet.title: INSANE/EVIL - Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition - Ep 43
snippet.description:
Welcome to an EVIL Let's Play of Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition on INSANE difficulty. We're going to try to play fairly quickly (especially in the early game), but try to be fairly completionist (even if we do things in an odd order!) My hope is to bring this character into BG2 and *finally* do a proper Let's Play of that most epic game.  We're playing as a Fighter/Mage/Thief - it's a pretty strong combo that still allows the more singularly-focused NPC companions shine. It also let's us side-step the lack of strong evil thieves in BG1.

Improved character AI scripts: Enhanced Powergaming Scripts  - https://www.gibberlings3.net/mods/other/enhanced-powergaming-scripts/

Want to see more? Make sure to Subscribe and Like!

snippet.title: INSANE/EVIL - Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition - Ep 37
snippet.description:
Welcome to an EVIL Let's Play of Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition on INSANE difficulty. We're going to try to play fairly quickly (especially in the early game), but try to be fairly completionist (even if we do things in an odd order!) My hope is to bring this character into BG2 and *finally* do a proper Let's Play of that most epic game.  We're playing as a Fighter/Mage/Thief - it's a pretty strong combo that still allows the more singularly-focused NPC companions shine. It also let's us side-step the lack of strong evil thieves in BG1.

Improved character AI scripts: Enhanced Powergaming Scripts  - https://www.gibberlings3.net/mods/other/enhanced-powergaming-scripts/

snippet.title: INSANE/EVIL - Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition - Ep 32
snippet.description:
Welcome to an EVIL Let's Play of Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition on INSANE difficulty. We're going to try to play fairly quickly (especially in the early game), but try to be fairly completionist (even if we do things in an odd order!) My hope is to bring this character into BG2 and *finally* do a proper Let's Play of that most epic game.  We're playing as a Fighter/Mage/Thief - it's a pretty strong combo that still allows the more singularly-focused NPC companions shine. It also let's us side-step the lack of strong evil thieves in BG1.

Improved character AI scripts: Enhanced Powergaming Scripts  - https://www.gibberlings3.net/mods/other/enhanced-powergaming-scripts/
